name: 刘艺的异世界冒险-Liu Yi's strange world adventure
name_original: 刘艺的异世界冒险-Liu Yi's strange world adventure
description:
The great demon king, who has been sealed for a hundred years on the beautiful muenquis continent, is slowly waking up and getting stronger props through plot breakthrough, sneaking, maze and other playing methods

Each time you pass a level, you can obtain a gem. The final light badge will bring you endless power

The task of defeating the demon king depends on you

Let's go! warrior!

"Liu Yi's adventure in a different world" will take you to a wonderful world you will never forget!
